modName: Dark grey - black Elven weapons and armor texture pack
summary: Alternate dark grey color for Elven items
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple re-texture of Elven items with only the color being changed. I felt that the default golden/brass color just looked to \"ornamental\", so I edited the colors to look a bit more like ebony armor. I also enhanced the red accents for some better contrast. All Elven weapons and armor (male and female) are covered.

INSTALLATION: just extract the archive and move the \"textures\" directory of your Data folder.

Note: this will override the default textures, and as such, may conflict with any other mod that does the same.
author: dbbolton
